scripts.build: npm run definitions && npm run build:js
scripts.clean: rimraf dist && rimraf dist-secure && (rimraf -g lib/**/*.jay-html.ts || :) && (rimraf -g lib/**/*.d.ts || :) && (rimraf -g lib-secure/**/*.d.ts || :)
scripts.mk-secure: npm run jay-secure && mv ./lib/counter.jay-html.ts ./lib-secure/main && cp ./lib/counter.ts ./lib-secure/sandbox && cp ./lib/counter-refs.d.ts ./lib-secure/main
scripts.confirm: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
